title: Instaban suppports that dont build sightsonte.
body: People that get assigned support NEED to build a sightstone, its the only core part of their kit that i worry about in a support, you can build crit bard support for all i care, but get a fucking sightstone. there is literally an item that gives you gold income while having a constant 4 wards, jesus christ ( this is coming form a support main that wants to play ADC.

replies.body:
What about those champions who benefit more from *Frost Queen's Claim* than a warding item? Should they be put at a disadvantage and get *Sightstone* just to satisfy your needs?

It's only 850g. If you want it so much, why don't you buy it yourself? That way you will be guaranteed a *Sightstone* on your team every game.

I mean, that's a very shallow argument, but so is his. Supports are designed to be useful *without* the item advantage that a lot of other roles rely on to do well, which is why support buy sightstone, they take the lesser hit for it. Ofc, I don't think you should be banning people who don't buy it, but if the team needs it, and you are ignoring it in favour of...whatever else, then that's not exactly the best idea, and kind of a dog move.

That 850g means a lot to an ADC, and ADC should not be building sightstone, especially early when it's really needed.
